snippet: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi recited the oath of office in Myanmar’s parliament on Wednseday, marking a watershed in national reconciliation after decades of military rule.
lead_paragraph: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi recited the oath of office in Myanmar’s parliament on Wednseday, marking a watershed in national reconciliation after decades of military rule.

headline.seo: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi Takes Her Seat in Myanmar’s Parliament
headline.main: Myanmar’s Opposition Leader Takes Her Seat in Parliament
headline.print_headline: Myanmar’s Opposition Leader Takes Her Seat in Parliament
